attributes.action: Government to rethink the £1000 grant for wet led pubs still closed in Tier 2
attributes.additional_details: 75% of wet led pubs will go bankrupt
attributes.background: Give more financial support to wet led pubs

rejection.details:
The £1,000 grant for wet-led pubs in Tiers 2 and 3 is in addition to other grants available to businesses affected by Covid-19 restrictions: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/prime-minister-announces-1000-christmas-grant-for-wet-led-pubs

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase either the £1,000 Christmas grant or monthly grants, but it would need to be clear what changes you want to be made to current grants.

We also couldn't publish a petition claiming that 75% of wet-led pubs will go bankrupt unless you can substantiate that statement.
